mapper.sql: uid, uname, upassword, uphone, uemail, ucode, usex, ubirth, uzip,uaddress
mapper.insert: insert into t_user (uid, uname, upassword, uphone, uemail, ucode, usex, ubirth, uzip,uaddress) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ubirth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{uzip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{uaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

uid,
uname,

usex,
ubirth,
uzip,
uaddress,

mapper.update:
update t_user
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upassword = #{upassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uphone = #{uphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uemail = #{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ucode = #{ucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usex = #{usex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ubirth = #{ubirth,jdbcType=DATE},
uzip = #{uzip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uaddress=#{uaddress}
where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_user set uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upassword = #{upassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uphone = #{uphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uemail = #{uemail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ucode = #{ucode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usex = #{usex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ubirth = #{ubirth,jdbcType=DATE}, uzip = #{uzip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uaddress=#{uaddress} where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
